p.s: The given excerpt from the movie The Hate U Give, directed by George Tillmann Jr., published in 2018 is about the maincharactermain character Starr and her boyfriend Chris who reunite at school after they had a fight.
Starr does not want to forgive Chris for what he did.
He tries to earn her forgiveness by making her listen to his own mash-up.
He tells her that she wants to move forward in their relationship but does not know how to.
Starr forgives him but doesn't admit she likes his mash-up so Chris decides to test it by dancing to it in the hall.
